text: Munich – The Edge of War is a 2021 British drama movie, directed by Christian Schwochow. It stars Jeremy Irons, George MacKay, Jannis Niewöhner, Sandra Hüller, Liv Lisa Fries, August Diehl, Jessica Brown Findlay, Anjli Mohindra, and Ulrich Matthes. The movie is about Neville Chamberlain's time as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom during the escalation of World War II and his relationship with Adolf Hitler. Munich – The Edge of War will release on January 21, 2022 through Netflix. ==References== Category:2021 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Netflix movies Category:Movies set in Munich Category:Movies based on books
title: Munich – The Edge of War
